title: The British airports where you're most likely to lose your luggage
text:
Passengers are most likely to lose their luggage and never see it again at Birmingham airport, according to Telegraph Travel’s analysis of Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) data.

Birmingham saw two unresolved lost luggage claims per one million customers between 2015 and the end of March 2019, more than any other airport in the UK.

The CAA data on lost luggage claims, obtained by MoneySuperMarket, revealed the top 10 airports (among those with more than one million passengers since 2015) for unsolved lost luggage issues, by total number of claims.

London Heathrow came top with 636 claims while London City Airport had the fewest overall with 15.
